member.name: M:FilmesApi.Main.Api.Controllers.FilmeController.Delete(System.Guid)
member.summary: Deletes a Filme by ID.
member.param: The ID of the Filme to be deleted.
member.returns: Returns a HTTP response with no content (204) if the Filme was successfully deleted. If the Filme is not found, the method returns a HTTP response with status code 404. If an unexpected error occurs, the method returns a HTTP response with status code 500.
